segments.text: I'm watching the woman still drying her plate, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her movements are so routine, so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how she maintains such a placid demeanor amidst the brewing chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water must be quite loud, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the splashing, the feeling of water, it should be undeniable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but marvel at this level of detachment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, if it weren't so concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are practically performing an acrobatic cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly impervious to the world around her, lost in her own thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's occupying her mind so completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is a testament to how easily we can miss critical details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised by the depth of her obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mundane act of drying a dish has become a surreal spectacle.
segments.speaker: PAR
